SELECT p.postNo ,p.memberId ,p.postTitle ,p.postContent ,to_char(postDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as postDate ,p.postView ,p.postLike
,p.originalFile ,p.savedFile
,p.reported FROM Posts p , MemberInfo m where p.memberId = m.memberId and p.postType = 'community' and p.memberId != 'admin'
and p.${searchItem} LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
